entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bissett
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
